Retrieve statistics about the wallet database (size, table counts, etc.).

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_database_stats","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with database statistics","required":["total_pages","free_pages","free_percentage","page_size","database_size_bytes","free_space_bytes","wal_pages"],"properties":{"database_size_bytes":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Total database size in bytes"},"free_pages":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Number of free pages"},"free_percentage":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Percentage of free space"},"free_space_bytes":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Free space in bytes"},"page_size":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Size of each page in bytes"},"total_pages":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Total pages in database"},"wal_pages":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Number of WAL pages"}},"title":"GetDatabaseStatsResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
